Monitor
Relationship Health

Internal allows you to monitor the health of your co-founder relationship in Slack.

Learn More

You are building a company. You have co-founders.

Internal provides you with insights about your relationship with your co-founders so that you can always be on the same page in order to most effectively build your startup.

Internal conveys the hard things to talk about, like how confindent in success you are and whether or not the work distribution is fair, in order to prevent co-founder burnout.

The most important thing on your mind is getting to market.

It's too easy to be so fuced on building your company that you forget to talk to your co-founders about the important things that your or they may be feeling.

Mitigate the chances of emotional drifts between co-founders so that you can maximize your probability of success.

Get to market, dominate your niche, and build the next unicorn, all while preserving your most vital relationship.

Benefits

Relationship insurance to mitigate the chance of a breakup

Communication

Actively know how your cofounders are feeling - break down the negative and uplift the positive.

Recognition

Become aware of peaks and valleys in your relationship - discover what makes each other tick.

Cohesion

Form stronger bonds and better dynamics by gaining insights that don't arise in day-to-day conversation.

Add to Slack

Start monitoring the health of your most important business relationship and add Internal to your Slack!
Have feedback for our team? We’d love to hear from you support@getinternal.co

About Us

A tool for easily communicating how you're doing

Internal lets you monitor how you and your co-founders are feeling so that you can have a clear gauge on the emotional health of your startup, allowing you to catch the previously unspoken feelings that can lead to co-founder breakups and burnout.

Frequently Asked Questions

If you don't find an answer here, be sure to contact us - we're happy to help!

  • What is emotional health?

    Emotional health is a measure of how well you are doing within your own head.

  • How can you measure emotions?

    We give you a single, emotion-related topic, like fulfillment, and give you 4 options to choose that describe how fulfilled you are. We can't quantify emotions themselves, but we can show how severely you are feeling a certain thing.

  • How do I cancel my subscription?

    Send us an email and we'll cancel your subscription within 12 hours. support@getinternal.co

  • Do you collect my data?

    We do, indeed, collect the necessary data to compute scores and things of that nature. For more information, feel free to take a glace at our Privacy Policy for a detailed account of data collection. Privacy Policy

  • Can anyone see what answers I choose?

    Nope! Only you have the ability to see what options you chose on your personal reports.

  • What are the insights Internal provides?

    Internal packages up your own or a team's aggregate responses to daily check ups and sends the results in an easily consumable Slack message on a daily, weekly, or monthly basis.

Internal helps people be more empathetic. We help teams build a culture of transparency and acceptance.
